strapiPost.title: Springdale Expanding Zoning Options
strapiPost.content:
City of Springdale want to expand the 'Special zoning' rules downtown to include the boarding neighborhoods

  • Info - "The city wants residential areas north of downtown by Mill Street and south of downtown along South Powell Street included in the downtown form-based code. The code allows flexibility in design with all structures helping to complete the vision of downtown Spring-dale as a livable, walkable, urban community, explained Austin Thomas, an assistant planner for the city." - NWA Democrat Gazette
  • Opinions Welcome - The Planning Commission will hold a meeting at 5:30 p.m. TONIGHT for any stakeholders to share their opinions of the proposal.
  • Deep Dive - More information and quotes from Springdale city officials can be found HERE
